io.delta.kernel

Class ScanFile

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.delta.kernel.ScanFile

  • public class ScanFile
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper methods provided by the Delta core to read data from a scan file entry and get metadata about the scan file entry.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static FileStatus getFileStatus(Row scanFileInfo)
      Get the FileStatus from given scan file row.
      static CloseableIterator<Tuple2<ColumnarBatch,ColumnVector>> readData(TableClient tableClient, Row scanState, java.util.Iterator<Row> scanFileRows, java.util.Optional<Expression> predicate)
      Get the data from a given scan files with using the connector provider TableClient.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getFileStatus

        public static FileStatus getFileStatus(Row scanFileInfo)
        Get the FileStatus from given scan file row. FileStatus object allows the connector to look at the partial metadata of the scan file.
        Parameters:
        scanFileInfo - Row representing one scan file.
        Returns:
        a FileStatus object created from the given scan file row.

      • readData

        public static CloseableIterator<Tuple2<ColumnarBatch,ColumnVector>> readData(TableClient tableClient,
                                                                             Row scanState,
                                                                             java.util.Iterator<Row> scanFileRows,
                                                                             java.util.Optional<Expression> predicate)
                                                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Get the data from a given scan files with using the connector provider TableClient.
        Parameters:
        tableClient - Connector provided TableClient implementation.
        scanState - Scan state returned by Scan.getScanState(TableClient)
        scanFileRows - an iterator of Rows. Each Row represents one scan file from the ColumnarBatch returned by Scan.getScanFiles(TableClient)
        predicate - An optional predicate that can be used for data skipping while reading the scan files.
        Returns:
        Data read from the scan file as an iterator of ColumnarBatches and ColumnVector pairs. The ColumnVector represents a selection vector of type boolean that has the same size as the data ColumnarBatch. A value of true at a given index indicates the row with the same index from the data ColumnarBatch should be considered and a value of false at a given index indicates the row with the same index in data ColumnarBatch should be ignored. It is the responsibility of the caller to close the iterator.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - when error occurs reading the data.
